name: Dozzle
description: Dozzle is a small web based app to monitor Docker logs.
short_desc: Dozzle is a small web based app to monitor Docker logs
author: Amir Raminfar

form_fields.label: Auth Provider
form_fields.hint: 'Use none' for no authentication or 'simple' for username 'admin' and password 'password'. To change credentials, consult the instructions on the app description.

form_fields.label: Enable Actions
form_fields.hint: Dozzle now supports Container Actions, which allows you to start, stop and restart container from within the UI in the dropdown menu.
